Galilee Mixture Organic Larkspur Seed

Product ID:3318G.113318G

Features tall spires of dense florets. All colors produce double blooms with a small percentage of singles. 1 1/2–1 3/4" florets on 9–12" flower spikes. Attracts hummingbirds. Mixture includes carmine, blue, lilac, pink, and white. (Varieties are subject to change depending upon availability.) USDA Certified Organic. Ht. 36-48". Avg. 13,500 seeds/oz. Packet: 100 seeds.

Caution:
All parts of this plant are poisonous, including the seeds. Exercise extreme caution around children and pets. The purchaser assumes all liability relating to the use of this product.
